recommendations: Shreyas Joshi â€œI am writing to express my sincere appreciation for the exceptional support and guidance I received from Abhay throughout my recent Google PM candidate hiring journey. From our initial contact to the final hiring decision, Abhay consistently demonstrated a level of professionalism, dedication, and genuine care that truly embodies Google's values. He was instrumental in ensuring a smooth and positive experience at every stage. His proactive communication, clear explanations, and prompt responses to my inquiries made me feel valued and informed. His willingness to go the extra mile, such as offering interview preparation tips and providing detailed feedback, showcased his commitment to my success. Having interacted with multiple recruiters during my job search, I can confidently say that Abhay's approach stood out. His knowledge of Google's culture, and ability to build rapport made me feel like a priority, not just another candidate. He truly reflected Google's values of respect, integrity, and collaboration, making me even more excited about the prospect of joining the company.â€
